docs.snippet: The U.S. Mail steamer Philadelphia, Capt. BROWN, from New-Orleans and Havana, arrived yesterday morning at an early hour.

headline.main: IMPORTANT FROM HAVANA.; Arrival of the Philadelphia and De Soto Specie on Freight Effect of the American Crisis in Cuba The Slave-trade Late Mexican News.

docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Mail steamer Philadelphia, Capt. BROWN, from New-Orleans and Havana, arrived yesterday morning at an early hour.

docs.snippet: The Cunard screw-steamship Kedar, Capt. LITTLE, from Liverpool, on the 27th ult., at 9 A.M., arrived at this port yesterday.

headline.main: INTERESTING FROM EUROPE.; ARRIVAL OF THE KEDAR. English Views of the American Crisis. IMPORTANT REFORMS IN FRANCE. INTERESTING NEWS FROM CHINA.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Cunard screw-steamship Kedar, Capt. LITTLE, from Liverpool, on the 27th ult., at 9 A.M., arrived at this port yesterday.

docs.snippet: I have recently traveled through all the principal cities of Georgia, and find the disunion feeling everywhere overwhelmingly in the ascendant.

headline.main: FROM GEORGIA.; THE PROGRAMME OF THE SECESSIONISTS RESIGNATION OF SENATOR CLAY. MEETING OF THE LOUISIANA LEGISLATURE QUESTION OF JURISDICTION BETWEEN OHIO AND KENTUCKY. A UNION MEETING IN PHILADELPHIA.

docs.lead_paragraph: I have recently traveled through all the principal cities of Georgia, and find the disunion feeling everywhere overwhelmingly in the ascendant.

docs.snippet: By the bark La Plata, Capt. CROWELL, arrived yesterday, we have dates to Oct. 24. The La Plata brings home as passengers Commander Thomas I. Page, U.S.N.; Lieut. R.R. Carter, U.S.N.: Lieut. O.F. Johnson, U.S.N.; Jacob Dungan, Passed Assistant...

headline.main: NEWS FROM BUENOS AYRES.; Arrival Home of the La Plata Exploring Expedition The Results Attained Political Intelligence, & c.

docs.lead_paragraph: By the bark La Plata, Capt. CROWELL, arrived yesterday, we have dates to Oct. 24. The La Plata brings home as passengers Commander Thomas I. Page, U.S.N.; Lieut. R.R. Carter, U.S.N.: Lieut. O.F. Johnson, U.S.N.; Jacob Dungan, Passed Assistant Surgeon; John W. Tynan, Third Assistant Engineer, and four men belonging to the La Plata Expedition.

headline.main: THE HALL ARCTIC EXPEDITION.; The Schooner Rescue and the Expedition Boat Lost Terrific Gale Cumberland and Frobisher's Straits Imaginary Coal and Iron Discovered, & c.

docs.lead_paragraph: Capt. HALL, the Commander of the Arctic Expedition which bears his name, has written the following letter to HENRY GRINNELL, Esq. It is without date, but the circumstance which it narrates will indicate the time at which it was written with sufficient certainty:

docs.snippet: The Empress, accompanied by the Countess DE MONTEBELLO, Madame DE SAULCY, and the Marquis DE LA GRANGE, left Douglas' Hotel in an open carriage about 11 o'clock on Wednesday forenoon, and proceeded by the Bridges, Nicoloson street, and so on to...

headline.main: The Empress of the French in Edinburg.; A CURIOUS EPISODE. ADDRESS OF THE LORD PROVOST. SPEECH OF THE EMPRESS. OBJECT OF THE EMPRESS' VISIT.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Empress, accompanied by the Countess DE MONTEBELLO, Madame DE SAULCY, and the Marquis DE LA GRANGE, left Douglas' Hotel in an open carriage about 11 o'clock on Wednesday forenoon, and proceeded by the Bridges, Nicoloson street, and so on to Dalkeith.

headline.main: ANOTHER METROPOLITAN MYSTERY; APPALLING MURDER IN TWELFTH-STREET. A Widow Woman Assassinated in Broad Daylight Robbery the Probable Motive The Perpetrator Unknown.
